ru.noties.requirements

Class Requirement

  • java.lang.Object
    • ru.noties.requirements.Requirement

  • public abstract class Requirement
extends java.lang.Object
    See Also:
    RequirementBuilder, RequirementBuilder.create(EventDispatcher, EventSource)

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  Requirement.Listener
      Listener to be notified about requirement resolution process

      A method to cancel requirement resolution process.
      abstract boolean isInProgress()
      A method to check if requirement resolution is currently in progress

      Synchronous method to check if the whole requirement cases chain meets requirement.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Requirement

        public Requirement()

    • Method Detail

      • validate

        public abstract void validate(Requirement.Listener listener)
        Please note that this method allows multiple listeners. If resolution process is started and validate was called again, then listener won\'t trigger full validation process, but instead subscribe for the result (when it will be obtained)
        Parameters:
        listener - Requirement.Listener to be notified about resolution progress

      • isValid

        public abstract boolean isValid()
        Synchronous method to check if the whole requirement cases chain meets requirement. Simply returns true or false without triggering requirement resolution
        Returns:
        a boolean indicating if this requirement is valid (meets requirement)
        Since:
        1.1.0

      • cancel

        public abstract void cancel()
        A method to cancel requirement resolution process. The same as calling cancel(Payload) with null payload
        Since:
        1.0.1
        See Also:
        cancel(Payload), isInProgress()

      • cancel

        public abstract void cancel(Payload payload)
        A method to cancel requirement resolution process. If there are active listeners, they will receive supplied payload in Requirement.Listener.onRequirementFailure(Payload)
        Parameters:
        payload - Payload to pass to active listeners of resolution process
        Since:
        1.0.1

      • isInProgress

        public abstract boolean isInProgress()
        A method to check if requirement resolution is currently in progress
        Returns:
        a boolean indicating if requirement resolution is in progress
        Since:
        1.0.1
